text: Fast & Furious 6 is a 2013 action-thriller movie. This movie is about a professional criminal gang who retired after an earlier bank heist. Dwayne Johnson plays Hobbs. Paul Walker plays Brian. Tyler Posey plays Tony. & Colton Haynes plays Kenneth. The movie grossed almost $790 million worldwide. == Cast == * Vin Diesel as Dominic "Dom" Toretto * Paul Walker as Brian O'Conner * Dwayne Johnson as Luke Hobbs * Michelle Rodriguez as Letty * Jordana Brewster as Mia Toretto * Tyrese Gibson as Roman Pierce * Chris "Ludacris" Bridges as Tej Parker * Sung Kang as Han Seoul-Oh * Gal Gadot as Gisele Yashar * Luke Evans as Owen Shaw * Gina Carano as Riley Hicks * Tyler Posey as Tony Toretto * Colton Haynes as Kenneth “Kennedy” Hicks * John Ortíz as Arturo Braga / Ramón Campos Category:2013 action movies Category:2013 thriller movies Category:2010s chase movies Category:Fast & Furious movies Category:Movies directed by Justin Lin
title: Fast & Furious 6
